roomname.translation: アウタースヘ゜ース
roomname.explanation: Literally Outer Space

roomname.translation: VVVVVV 次元
roomname.explanation: The overall area that the game takes place in.

roomname.translation: 船
roomname.explanation: The dimension exploring spaceship

roomname.translation: シークレットラボ
roomname.explanation: An endgame section containing achievement trophys

roomname.translation: ラボ
roomname.explanation: One of the stages

roomname.translation: タワー
roomname.explanation: One of the stages

roomname.translation: ワープゾーン
roomname.explanation: One of the stages

roomname.translation: スペースステーション
roomname.explanation: One of the stages

roomname.translation: 次元VVVVVVの外
roomname.explanation: For rare rooms outside the normal area

roomname.translation: スーパーグラビトロン
roomname.explanation: An expanded version of the room at 53, 50

roomname.english: I Can't Believe You Got This Far
roomname.translation: コンナ ハ゛ショ マテ゛ ヨク キタネ
roomname.explanation: If you're playing No Death Mode, the room Prize for the Reckless has this roomname instead (the room is altered to make it possible to do this section without dying)

roomname.english: Imagine Spikes There, if You Like
roomname.translation: ソウソ゛ウ シテコ゛ラン・・・ソコニトケ゛カ゛アル ト
roomname.explanation: If you're playing a time trial, the room Prize for the Reckless has this roomname instead (the room is altered to make it possible to do this section without dying)

roomname.translation: リアウィント゛ウ
roomname.explanation: Named after the Hitchcock film (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)

roomname.translation: リア ウ゛ィント゛ウ
ウォーターフロント ニテ
roomname.explanation: Named after the 1954 film (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)

roomname.translation: ウ゛ォーターフロント ニテ
シ゛・アンタッチャホ゛ー
roomname.explanation: Before it was a film, the Untouchables was a TV series in 1959 (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)

roomname.translation: シ゛・アンタッチャウ゛ォー
タンヘ゜ンニュースエイカ゛
roomname.explanation: Refers to Television Newsreel. (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)

roomname.translation: タンヘ゜ンニューウ゛エイカ゛
ウ゛ンヘ゜ンニューウ゛エイカ゛
ウ゛ンフ゛ンウ゛ューウ゛エィウ゛

ニ゛ュース V ウ゛クロッウ゛
ニュース B オ゛クロック
ニュース 9 オクロック
roomname.explanation: (Second part of the final stage has references to Colour TV shows)

roomname.translation: オクサマハ ウ゛ァシ゛ョ
roomname.explanation: Reference to early black and white sitcom Bewitched (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)

roomname.translation: オウ゛サウ゛ハウ゛ァシ゛ョ

roomname.explanation: Named after the Hitchcock film (Second part of the final stage has references to Colour TV shows)

roomname.translation: カ゛ンウ゛モーク
roomname.explanation: Gunsmoke was a black and white Western (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)

roomname.translation: カ゛ウ゛スモーウ゛
カ゛ウ゛ウ゛モーウ゛
カ゛ンウ゛モーウ゛ 1w6
ウ゛ンスモーク 19v6
カ゛ンスモーク 1966
roomname.explanation: Gunsmoke changed to colour in 1966 (Second part of the final stage has references to Colour TV shows)

roomname.translation: クリカエシ オタノシミクタ゛サイ
roomname.explanation: This stage also has a number of rooms which are harder versions of easier challenges, like this one. (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)

roomname.translation: クリカエシオタノウ゛ミクタ゛サイ

ヨハクノ ソトカ゛ワ

roomname.translation: アンテナ フ゛ンフ゛ン
roomname.explanation: (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)
